column4: running 10.04 and my dvd r/w drive is non responsive.  the drive shows up in the file system, but inserted disks do not show up.  noted the problem when I tried to burn a disk using brasero and got told there was no disk inserted.
have you tried to boot of the livecd or anything to make sure the drive hasn't just packed up ? ie have u verified the drive is working normally and it's just ubuntu
